question: 一千
sourceMnemonic: If you have one thousand, you have <vocabulary>one thousand</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. The only thing that's a bit weird is the reading of the <ja>一</ja>. The <ja>ち</ja> turns into a small <ja>っ</ja>, making the reading for this word <ja><reading>いっせん</reading></ja>.
